desc: Save money by buying your Cutting Fluids, machining coolants, sump cleaner and shop cleaners direct from the manufacturer and cutting out those expensive middle-man mark-ups! We sell the top of the line SterlingCool cutting fluid products and we are committed to saving you money and delivering you an amazing product!
